Attribute.Description: 3 character Document Identifier Code. Reference only.
Free form to record Requisitioner Name
Free form to record Requisitioner contact number
master work order number - will be same as the return number incase this master work order is from returns
System of Origin - ROSS or ICBSR as of 10/21/2008
City for a Shipping Instruction shipping method
State for a Shipping Instruction shipping method
Ross Dispatch Unit Id for the incident
The trackable Id in case of Inicident transfers
Requested Qty in Supplier UOMs (Reference only)
The flag(Y/N) to notify ROSS of full backorder
The flag(Y/N) to notify ROSS of full forward order
Number of labels required for a kit
Flag to print report and SKU labels
Total Number of Pieces in a Shipment
